rukus.text: Condemned som those disbelieved Dieta Izrael jazyk David Jesus syn Mary. This they disobeyed transgressed
They nie enjoin jeden iny z committing zly! Chudobny indeed je co they robit
Ona see vela z them allying those disbelieve! Chudobny indeed je co ich hands sent forth ich souls. GOD bol angry them consequently they abide forever retribution
Had they verit v GOD prophet v co revealed him tu they nie befriended them. vela z them bol zly
Ona zalozit ze zly enemies believers bol Zid idol worshipers. Ona zalozit ze koniec ludia friendship believers bol those say My je Christian This je they have knaz monks them they nie bol arrogant
When they hear co revealed posol ona see ich oci zaplava s tears mat rad they recognize truth therein they say Our Lord my verit so pocitat us svedok
Why my nie verit v GOD truth pojdem us hope our Lord admit us righteous ludia
GOD rewarded them saying this; He admit them ZAHRADA flowing streams They abide therein forever Such bol reward for the righteous
Mat rad for those disbelieve zamietnut our revelations they je dwellers Hell
